website_summaries.verdict: This is a great inspection mirror with a long reach and a second mirror in case one gets broken.
pros: Comes with two 2.25-inch round mirrors and a 30-inch retractable handle
Mirror can be tilted for easy viewing at any angle
Soft, ergonomic handle glides easily without sticking
cons: A few users have complained about the mirrors not attaching securely to the handle

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: This broke relatively quickly. (The mirror snapped off - not the way it's supposed to detach, actually broken.) There is another mirror attachment I can use instead but overall I wasn't super impressed. We are using this for geocaching and I do have young kids, but we weren't all that rough with it. The telescoping aspect is fine. I found that the mirror shifted position too easily for what we needed it for - slight pressure or even its own weight was enough to make it move, which is annoying when you are trying to see one specific spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Folds up nicely to fit into my bag. Good reach. Does what it's supposed to do. Cons: (I might be just a little picky) The mirror is on a ball pivot thing which is great for folding it up, but it is a little looser that I would like. It doesn't stay in place for very long. With my job, time is of the essence (housekeeping) and when I'm trying to look under beds and the mirror loses its position easily it adds to my time.
customer_reviews.author: nikkicola54

customer_reviews.title: Reflections of each other!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little inspection mirrors and priced right. The little flex hinge nut was a little loose when I started using the first mirror(mirror flopped around). I loosened the nut enough to exposed some threads and put a tiny drip of blue loctite on the threads before tightening the flex hinge nut back down. Now it's got the perfect tension on the hinge to allow me to manipulate the mirror head and yet stay where I position it, and the nut hasn't backed out. In my experience it's best to buy two of this type of item because almost certainly one will get broken if it's used a lot, so a two pack was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Totally ImAussieBull

customer_reviews.title: A great mirror on a stick
customer_reviews.text: Its a mirror on a stick. Great for looking at stuff that you don't want to crawl under, crawl up, or stick your face in. Comes with a spare mirror - in case you use the stick as a stick and hit something/someone with it and break your mirror. Meets my expectations for a mirror on a stick. It will meet all of your mirror on a stick needs too. Pleased with purchase. Would buy again. I don't know if anyone would like a mirror on a stick as a gift, so I'm giving it 3 stars for giftability. I'd think anyone who gave me a mirror on a stick was kinda weird.
customer_reviews.author: Kasem O

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: One of my vehicles has an under tray below the engine bay that will not let dropped items make it all the way to the floor. So with the telescoping mirror as well as an LED lit magnetic "claw" I am able to retrieve dropped bolts, clamps and other fasteners. I participate in "track day events" as often as my schedule and bank accounts will let me. I'd HATE to have a bolt or other fastener fall out of the bottom of my car and onto the racetrack. It could end up being picked up by a tire and cause a puncture... that would be bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt ZCG

customer_reviews.title: Average quality, but still very useful. Good value for the price, nice addition to your tool chest!
customer_reviews.text: The handle is well made, but the metal surrounding the glass mirror is shoddy construction. a perfect example of you get what you pay for. One nice feature, it does come with a spare mirror (and you know you are going to break one!). Great for those automotive jobs where you can't see the bolt/nut you are trying to get a hold of!
customer_reviews.author: NPR MANTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Nice extendable mirror and pick-up magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Well made with 2 identical round mirrors and a pretty strong pick up magnet that should lift a few ounces. I’d suggest considering use of a cheap clip-on LED light on the extension arm to illuminate dark spots. Maybe one mirror could be convex for wider view, but you could break one and still have a duplicate. A longer wrist coupling in the ball-jointed articulation might be useful around obstacles. I may try mounting a small camera on the extension arm to focus on the mirror for checking hidden serial numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these of various total lengths I've gotten over time, and this is the best so far. Longer reach than most, nice non-slip grip, pocket clip, and it even comes with a 2nd mirror. A very good value.
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: Large Mirrors.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size; it's very large and easy to see. I like that it comes with a spare mirror of the same size. Obviously, because of the large size, it will not fit in every nook and cranny, in which case you'd need a smaller sized mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Julia

customer_reviews.title: really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: All other mirrors I have had so far would have an issue with holding the mirror straight once extended, this one is really sturdy and tight and does not roll on itself. I thought I would try it because it seemed to have a big diameter. i am very happy I did. The mirror bracket joint tightness is properly adjusted right out the box, that is also a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Laouenan D.

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: Actually received a tool of much higher quality than I expected. That experience alone, in todays high dollar/low quality market place, made the purchase worthwhile. I no longer have any real challenges finding things I drop, all of which seem to find their way under furniture and every other place I have difficulty looking... Nothing is too high or too low anymore!
customer_reviews.author: William S. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: It has met my needs so far. The only reason I give it a 4 instead of a 5 is because of the quality of the item. It's your typical Chinese junk. You can tell it's poorly made. But I don't need precision for what I'm using it for. I just hope it lasts for a few years. It's nice that you get two mirrors. You're bound to break one at some point.
customer_reviews.author: StoogeMoe

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Well, its not what I'd call "well made', but it seems to be good enough. Mirror's a bit small but you get used to it. Overall worth the $. I don't use this every day so can't comment on long term durability.
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good
customer_reviews.text: The tools are reasonably sturdy and the flexible joints stiff enough to hold position while still allowing adjustments. I am disappointed in the mirror rim that extends well beyond the mirror in a somewhat sharp edge. It would be better if this rim were rolled down giving better access to polish the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: One broke within a week the other two weeks later. Had to constantly tighten the bolt for the mirror to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Juan P. Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Looks very used.
customer_reviews.text: This looks really bad. It really looks trashed. Like they used it for a few months before packaging it and selling it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus H

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Bought product to use as work when cleaning rooms to check the tops of the cabinets without having to get on a step stool. A great concept and tool...however it broke fairly quickly from telescoping the stick. :(
customer_reviews.author: Traci E.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect too much about this tool. But after I receive it and try it, I am quite pleased and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: jie tao

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The mirror doesn't stay where you aim it. When you bend it and hold it down, the mirror flops down. Also, the mirror is smaller than I thought and doesn't really help to see much.
customer_reviews.author: tpresley

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the cost, item is exactly as advertised. Super quick shipping! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Broke easily
customer_reviews.text: The mirror screws into the arm and isn't very secure, it actually fell apart in my hand after using for a few days. I decided to tighten with pliers and it broke before adding any torque. Got a Kobalt from Lowes, way better replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool that saves time & will last through abuse
customer_reviews.text: I like that this kit comes with a second mirror as a replacement, however I don’t for see needing it anytime soon. It is very well-made and holds its position well. Just the right size for getting behind copper pipes that I am brazing to check my work.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Fryer

customer_reviews.title: Was handy for making a diagram of the serpentine belt ...
customer_reviews.text: Was handy for making a diagram of the serpentine belt and pulleys on my vehicle before replacing and checking to make sure it was installed correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It came with two mirrors, one was stripped out. It isn’t a top notch product but a decent tool if you don’t want to break your good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sapperjoe

customer_reviews.title: This tool is of great benefit, a must have.
customer_reviews.text: Went above, maybe to my error, as it contained a replacement mirror. Using it is so beneficial and easy to use due to its size and flexibility. I use it in my shop to find hidden bolts/nuts, to find problems or just to check for quality/completeness. I recommend this tool to anyone who sometime needs to find things in tight close spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping inspection mirror works as described and comes with additional ...
customer_reviews.text: Telescoping inspection mirror works as described and comes with additional mirror head in the event original mirror is damaged. Allows for inspection in small places!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tooluxe 20734L Telescoping Inspection Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Looks well made and handy for areas I am unable to see. Has a 2d mirror in case one breaks.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer Dave

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately I really need to have two complete mirrors so this purchase wasn't super helpful. Also the mirror head tends to be
customer_reviews.text: a bit misleading. The package contains only one telescopic mirror but does include a spare mirror head. unfortunately I really need to have two complete mirrors so this purchase wasn't super helpful. Also the mirror head tends to become loose very easily but I'm sure some blue Loctite would address that.
customer_reviews.author: Rotten

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine for seeing into those hard to reach spots
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine for seeing into those hard to reach spots. The telescoping feature is super useful, and the fact that it comes with a replacement mirror is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality, and the magnet is strong. I'm not sure why I need a spare mirror, but I guess it's handy to have it, in case the original breaks? (Presumably, using it in tight places could put it in harm's way.)
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: telescoping mirror
customer_reviews.text: Never know when something like this can be handy. I used it to view something on a lower angle than my car mirror would show me while sitting in the car. It is now a part of my tool kit.
customer_reviews.author: Arley

customer_reviews.title: observing nature items without touching
customer_reviews.text: I have worked with this product inspecting bluebird nesting boxes and monitoring Monarch Butterfly Habitat for the eggs and instar stages. It is an excellent product and I intend to order more for use by youngsters on guided Nature hikes so that they can observe without touching.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M

customer_reviews.title: With a spare!
customer_reviews.text: Shattered a mirror I'd had for nearly a decade. Low and behold this kit has a spare, now I have 2 mirrors!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cholewinski

customer_reviews.title: Even more versatile than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Attached this to a reaching tool and can now check gutters without pulling out the ladder. Saves time and energy. Ladder stays in garage until it’s really needed.
customer_reviews.author: mollyo

customer_reviews.title: As advertised... pretty handy having an extra mirror that you can change out.
customer_reviews.text: I'm an inspector and use these all the time. Just like the usual one I get from the local home improvement store. Very nice having the additional mirror since the glass breaking on the mirror is the only issue.
customer_reviews.author: clay282

customer_reviews.title: Mirror ok
customer_reviews.text: Wish the tip was smaller to fit into spaces where screws and pieces fall.
customer_reviews.author: Critic

customer_reviews.title: Priced appropriately
customer_reviews.text: About what you would expect for the price. Not bad at all, just don't set your expectations to high.
customer_reviews.author: snowman1

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Mirror and magnet on a stick?! Who can complain? These are worth the hood review and another purchase if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Best price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This set is very reasonably priced and is well made, the magnet is stronger than I expected! I will be purchasing another set in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great when trying to get into those tight spaces. I use it a lot when working on my cars and it has help up pretty well thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Douda

customer_reviews.title: Great Inspection Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very nice inspection mirror with replacement mirror. Well constructed and sold at a very reasonable price....
customer_reviews.author: Avsubman

customer_reviews.title: If it had a slightly larger mirror it would have been even better for what I was using it for
customer_reviews.text: It is a well made tool and functions as it should. If it had a slightly larger mirror it would have been even better for what I was using it for. That said, it's smaller size fits well in tight places.
customer_reviews.author: lesselby

customer_reviews.title: This tool is built as good as any on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a lot of tools over the last 50 years. This tool is built as good as any on the market. It also comes with an extra mirror to help with the dumb things that happen.
customer_reviews.author: TEG

customer_reviews.title: Feels really sturdy and has a super long reach while keeping a ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels really sturdy and has a super long reach while keeping a relatively small handle. The mirrors thread in very easily and the swivel is good out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Shika

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware when purchasing anything made in China!!!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this item today and wouldn't you know it just as expected when getting anything made in China. One of the mirror assemblies doesn't even have the threaded end to attach it to the handle. And the telescoping handle is also of the same wonderful quality that I have become accustom to from any product that is made in China. Glad it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: john n.

customer_reviews.title: Heads up!
customer_reviews.text: Now my poor hubby doesn't have to stand on his head while looking under our cabinets like he did to find the motor size for our disposal. This little beauty would have solved that problem, instead of laying down on the floor and using my hand mirror. Don't just stop with looking under counters, use for anything you need to see behind, around, over or under!!
customer_reviews.author: TexasLady813

customer_reviews.title: Too small to see much.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a special purpose for a tiny mirror great but at the end of the extension you not gonne see much.
customer_reviews.author: Stew

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dandy tool
customer_reviews.text: Handy dandy little tool to view hard to see areas. I use mine to check for ticks on my back after coming indoors from work in the wild country. Works for other uses like looking under and behind furniture. Compact and easy to store
customer_reviews.author: R. Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Have you ever said “Hey! What’s that behind there a small distance away
customer_reviews.text: Works well if you want to look behind things from a distance. If you’re not interested in doing this then you will not appreciate this product. Got one for inspections and it does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: wmcksmith

customer_reviews.title: does a great job for being able to see the 5th wheel ...
customer_reviews.text: does a great job for being able to see the 5th wheel hitch connection status without having to climb into the bed of the truck to see.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Does the job- not flimsy-
customer_reviews.text: Broke my old one and was glad to find this inexpensive replacement on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very thin metal
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this mirror used it a few times and it was bend alittle and wouldn’t slide back together tired to bend it back alittle and it snapped off
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lukich

customer_reviews.title: Very small!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if this item should be able to be called a inspection mirror. The mirror is very small and the pole is very thin. This would be a great gift for a toddler playing security.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Terry

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty good. I like the fact you can unscrew ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty good. I like the fact you can unscrew the mirror and replace it rather than having to get a whole new one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for watching birds' nests.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror because a robin built her nest on the crook of a downspout on my house. The extending handle and adjustable mirror allows me to peek in at the growing baby birds without touching or disturbing the nest, and it doesn't frighten the babies because they don't even see me-- though Mom chatters at me from a nearby tree. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Tennant

customer_reviews.title: It really works in the Gargare
customer_reviews.text: It works great when I'm working in small areas like under the truck, garage, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: A good quality mirror. The spare is nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes with a spare mirror and the telescoping extension makes it easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for locating an engine oil leak on my car.
customer_reviews.author: TiminAliso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to exam the bottom of my feet. Works great. Well made and comes with an extra mirror attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Utley

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: this tool is versatile, it has great extension and the mirror size is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed, and came with an extra mirror. I used it while changing the timing belt on my 2005 Subaru Outback. Came in handy to line up the timing belt marks on the new belt. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David Stembridge

customer_reviews.title: One of the mirror threads was broken. Could only ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the mirror threads was broken. Could only use the one mirror. If that breaks I don't have a spare. Not worth returning for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Works better then my craftsman, kobalt, titan, and a few other. I got it used from amazon warehouse deals. Great buy if you need one.
customer_reviews.author: brandon z.

customer_reviews.title: Good price but mirror Head comes off
customer_reviews.text: Don't forget to put lok-tite on the hardware or it will come off. Perhaps they should have a lock nut to keep the head from coming off of the handle. Otherwise, great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CORtempdoc

customer_reviews.title: Defective; Mirror cannot be attached
customer_reviews.text: Defectively manufactured. The end of the telescoping rod is supposed to have a hole where the mirror can be screwed-in, but the item I received lacked this hole (see picture), so there's nowhere to attach the mirror. Will be returning..
customer_reviews.author: Amir A Badiei

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works Great. The mirror swivel is stiff enough to stay in place well, but it moves easy enough when needed. The extension works well too. Basically it does what it is supposed to, let me see behind engine parts.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a mirror that wasn't going to start spinning in the shaft after a while. I saw this one and thought that the way it screws in to the shaft as apposed to being crimped in might remedy that. It does. Good mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Deven

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for work! It works great for him!
customer_reviews.author: Josey Keep

customer_reviews.title: Handy when needed
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. It is in my tool box for the day I need it. It is a must have for me.
customer_reviews.author: grammiepammie

customer_reviews.title: Very handy tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed to do some work inside my truck door. This telescoping mirror seems to be well-enough made and did help me get the job done. I had to look at some pieces inside the door to see how they fit together. I couldn't have seen what I needed to see without this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Timbers

customer_reviews.title: Works great in reading information on the back of items
customer_reviews.text: This telescoping tool allows you to see things in close quarters. Works great in reading information on the back of items.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Pochard

customer_reviews.title: Very handy tool when you loose a nut in the engine bay of a car
customer_reviews.text: Very handy tool when you loose a nut in the engine bay of a car
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, comes with two mirror heads!
customer_reviews.text: Nice inspection mirror. Love that it comes with a replacement mirror head. Pretty simple and works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Nice and handy.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, did have to tighten the screws on the joint some. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Stars in Rancho Cucamonga

customer_reviews.title: Great inspection tool
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to buy it after reading some of the bad reveiws but when I got I figured out it was well design. Ligthweigth, flexible and you can adjust the screws so that it holds well. I do not use it on a daly basis but it has been very good. I like the fact that it has a replacement mirror. It fit in my shirt pocket. The extension also holds well.
customer_reviews.author: Zagor

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I use it to check the oil on my motorcycle. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, comes with a spare mirror. Indispensable when doing automotive work!
customer_reviews.author: DeltaCharlie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: The Inspection Mirror seem solid and well made for the price. I recomend this product for A&P's on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, the mirror get loose, so you have to tight it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Needs a larger mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are using this in a confined space (in which case, I could see very good use for this), the mirror is so small it is difficult to find what you are trying to look at. If I were purchasing again, I would look for something with a mirror at least twice as large.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M. Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Great helping tools
customer_reviews.text: If you need some extra gadgets for your inspections, I highly recommend this set. Spare mirror, rigid and not shaking or loose when fully extended. I simply love it
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: This is a great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built mirror and the extra just in case is great.
customer_reviews.author: HensAndPens

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Love thar it comes with a second mirror, in case one makes a booboo. Would recommend to a mechanic.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: good and cheap
customer_reviews.text: works good. what else can i say. no issues with it
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.text: Mirror had no threads so could not be assembled. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: PilotBill

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The telescopic handle is great, the mirrors came with little micro scratches on them.
customer_reviews.author: bud riley

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Comes in very handy when working on cars. These days the manufacturers make it very hard to see and work on some areas of the engine.
customer_reviews.author: RayN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came with two mirror heads looks and feels well made.
customer_reviews.author: Huey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tool For Small Inspections
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for the hard to reach / household handy works that need to be closely inspected. Very happy with this purchase :-)
customer_reviews.author: IZZY

customer_reviews.title: Telescope mirror
customer_reviews.text: It's great, kinda large though. But still works for double checking ears lol.
customer_reviews.author: 7walck

customer_reviews.title: Tooluxe Lightweight 30-Inch Replaceable Inspection Mirror, with 2.25-Inch mirrors (2)
customer_reviews.text: This extention mirror allows me to look up under things without having to lay down and look up, or to look down on something without climbing a ladder. It has come in handy several times. It is well built, and sould last several years.
customer_reviews.author: jib

customer_reviews.title: Essential tool
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, should hold up well. The extra mirror is nice for when the one gets scratched or broken, instant backup.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Mirror doesn't attach
customer_reviews.text: This product is very poorly manufactured. The bolt on the pole end is too small to securely screw in. So neither of the mirrors will securely attach to the pole and they will fall off the first time they are turned upside down or bumped. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: VMD

customer_reviews.title: Extremely useful. I've used this multiple times for many different ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely useful. I've used this multiple times for many different things and it's very handy.
customer_reviews.author: ∞

customer_reviews.title: look in the mirror
customer_reviews.text: extends and is clear . A very helpful tool for autos and trucks and more
customer_reviews.author: EErock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and I appreciate that a spare mirror is included.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror
customer_reviews.text: Good mirror, nice that it came with a replacement mirror in case it gets broken. Good size, not to small and not to big.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made, but for that price it still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: emanation

customer_reviews.title: Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Handy mirror that is used often, extends long and the head swivels in all directions. Once the mirror is set on an angle it stays, very sturdy not loose at all. The handle is nice as well as the extra mirror head incase of an accidental break.
customer_reviews.author: mark

product_meta.title: Tooluxe 20734L Telescoping Inspection Mirror | Includes Two 2-1/4" Glass Mirrors | 30" Retractable Handle, Original version
product_meta.description: Lightweight 30-Inch Replaceable Inspection Mirror with comfortable soft grip handle. Perfect for auto mechanics or home owners for inspecting hard-to-reach areas.
feature_bullets: [VALUE]: Each package comes with 2 replaceable glass mirrors.
[COMFORT]: Soft grip handle is comfortable and easy to hold.
[LONG-REACH]: Telescoping up to 30 inches in overall length.
[CONVENIENCE]: Perfect for auto mechanics or home owners for inspecting hard-to-reach areas

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars493 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
